name: Unorganized
description:
Welcome to Unorganized, a game created slowly, one hour per day!

Gameplay currently includes 8 days, a vast amount of mechanics, and 3 upgrades! Game progress will be saved at the end of each day. Any actions performed in the middle of work will not be recorded on quit.

All sprites, models, and sound effects were either created by me or royalty-free and non-copyright.

The controls are simple; use your mouse to interact with various objects in the game! Some actions may require the use of a keyboard, though very few. Use space to summon the scale once you have unlocked it.  In order to reset your save data, you have to get to the End Day screen and press the ~ key by doing shift + ` (shift and backquote).

ATTENTION: Your scores, upgrades, and other saved player information will reset with each update because of itch.io's upload procedure. To keep all of your data secure, please download the WIN version if possible.
